Description:
Designer Home With Captivating Spaces on 680m2
Design excellence, floorplan flexibility & a long list of features illustrate the allure of this massive single level home delivering a family environment situated in a blue-chip location within walking distance to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & encompassing a commanding street presence with two crossovers, spacious interiors and situated on 680m2 (approx.) of land.
Walk up towards the impressive grand frontage & be graced by the homes immaculate light-filled interior which showcases 4 super large bedrooms plus 3 living areas, a master suite of epic proportions boasting walk-in robes, full ensuite and your very own Retreat area.
Continue through to the heart of the home & meet the hostess kitchen, fully equipped stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone benchtops, ample bench space, ample cupboard space & adjoining a large meals & family zone where everyday relaxing is accompanied by views of a colossal entertaining area where hosting large-scale parties will be a breeze. A side driveway provides plenty of space for cars, trailers and caravans.
Should you feel up for a quiet night in, the home even comes with an added bonus of a Theatre room/Rumpus.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy. Extras include ducted heating, high ceilings, superb storage, striking main bathroom, roomy laundry & remote double garage with internal access.
Nothing to do but simply move in & start living, it also offers easy access to the area's popular schools & shopping centres, parks & trails, public transport & major arterials. Inspections will not disappoint. Call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Description:
Single-Level Style on a Large Craigieburn Corner
n a family-focused neighbourhood renowned for its large allotments and exceptional urban convenience, this fabulous home delivers on all fronts with its impressive indoor/outdoor space, abundance of natural light and close proximity to Craigieburn's key amenities.
Flawless presentation from start to finish, the home's sprawling single-level floorplan showcases an extra-large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs, home office (potential 4BR) and main family bathroom.
Versatile living zones add to the appeal including a formal lounge and dining with bay window, together with a spacious open-plan family/meals area accompanied by a contemporary timber-top kitchen with dual ovens, 900mm gas cooktop, dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling for all-seasons enjoyment, security shutters, family-sized laundry and excellent storage options throughout.
Completing the picture is a spacious yet wonderfully private backyard complete with undercover entertaining deck, large wrap-around pergola, low-maintenance gardens and remote-control garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, local parks, primary and secondary schools, it's also close to childcare centres and kindergartens, choice of shopping centres, the convenience of Craigieburn Station and easy access to the Hume Freeway.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Single-Level Family Flair in the Heart of Highlands
With its free-flowing design, quality inclusions and established low-maintenance surrounds, this freestanding home delivers an environment that's ready to simply move in and enjoy - all in a family-focused neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Highlands.
Instantly inviting with its wide entrance hallway and abundance of natural light, the home features a large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite with double vanity, as well as 3 additional bedrooms with robes and stylish main bathroom.
Spacious and versatile, the open-plan living/dining area is further enhanced by a stone-bench kitchen complete with island breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher and large pantry.
Ducted heating and split-system air conditioning add to the appeal, along with solar/gas hot water, efficient LED lighting and CCTV monitoring system.
Step outside to discover a fabulous al-fresco entertaining deck and north-facing backyard with synthetic turf and high bamboo fencing all-round for exceptional privacy, plus a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Newbury Boulevard buses at the end of the street, it's walking distance to local shops, childcare, community centre and Newbury Primary School, also close to Malcolm Creek trails and parkland, Highland Shopping Centre, Mount Ridley College and Hume Anglican Grammar.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
The View Speaks For Itself!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 39 Excelsior Heights Craigieburn. Situated proudly on a large 850m2 allotment in the highly desirable and sought after pocket of Mt Ridley, this is the place to call home. Set amongst some of the finest properties that Craigieburn has to offer and spread across two levels, this home has space for the whole family.
Downstairs presents you with a large formal lounge, home office/study and a large family rumpus room. Cooking will be a joyous prospect with a spacious kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and a lovely city view which overlooks the family and meals area which also takes advantage of the stunning city view.
As you head upstairs, you are welcomed with a light filled retreat area complete with another perfect vantage point to take in the amazing views on offer. Upstairs also presents a massive master bedroom complete with plantation shutters, walk in robe and ensuite as well as three further bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a central bathroom with bathtub.
Entertaining guests will be a joy with a large decking area perfect for those beautiful summer nights and the perfect spot to watch the New Years Eve fireworks. Step down from the decking and take advantage of the large backyard, perfect for kids and pets to play or maybe the optimal spot for your very own pool.
This magnificent family home is complete with ducted heating, evaporative cooling upstairs, downstairs powder room, alarm, ducted vacuum system, drive through garage, under house storage and much more.
Located in the prime spot of Mt Ridley, with a large 850m2 block and a charming family home with multiple living zones, this is one you will want to see!

Description:
Large Single-Level Sensation on 608m2
An absolutely idyllic environment for growing families, this better-than-brand new home occupies one of the area's larger allotments and comes with everything in place to simply move in & start living.
Greeted by a wide entrance hallway, the home's impressive interior reveals an extra-large
master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite with double vanity, along with 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & stylish main bathroom.
Add to this a separate lounge, vast & versatile open-plan living/dining area supplemented by a beautifully-appointed kitchen complete with premium Ilve appliances & large walk-in pantry. High square-set ceilings & stone benchtops throughout, the home also includes ducted heating & evaporative cooling, plantation shutters, solar hot water, family-sized laundry & large linen cupboards.
Stacker doors lead out to an al-fresco entertaining deck with cafe blinds, plus a substantial backyard with large storage shed & remote-control double garage with internal entry. Walking distance to Balmain Road buses, Pinnacle Park & The Corner Store, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway, it will also offer close proximity to the best of Merrifield's coming amenities including sports facilities, retail & dining precincts, future primary & secondary schools.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
One of a kind!
It's a rarity when you find the home of your dreams, where you can turn the key, and move right in. From the moment you step up to the walkway to enter, you are greeted with a friendly, safe, and homely feel, set in an established street near a host of amenities. This stunning family home offers 5 great size bedrooms, Master with Walk in robe with En-suite and built in robes in other bedrooms. Showcasing 3 distinct living zones, including the formal lounge, rumpus room, open-plan family area and kids retreat. Other features include ducted heating, cooling, S/S appliances and plenty of storage space. Sits on a generous size allotment measured approximately 512m2.

Endless Possibilities in Prime Location
Quality built.....
Four bedroom Double Storey, available for your viewing.
Built to last and an impressive home that will stand the test of time.
Hardwood polished floorboards on entry are a delightful way to satisfy your senses. Aesthetically, beautifully designed home with a show stopper of a kitchen. Stunning kitchen is an eyecatcher with great amount of storage space.
Suitable for a growing family, with two Living areas, extending your Living zones.
Low maintenance yard, allowing you freedom to enjoy your weekends.
This impressive home offers 4 great sized bedrooms with large Built in robes and one bedroom is located downstairs. The other 3 bedrooms upstairs including the master bedroom has its own uniqueness with the views it offers and the bedroom with perfect city views is a special mention.

This home offers so much potential for the right buyer. Buy today & reap the rewards tomorrow!

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering fully equipped kitchen, main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room, formal lounge, study/optional 4th bedroom, alarm system, double lock up garage with internal access and much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
When Location Matters.
Comfort, style, and great location is what's on offer when you enter this much-loved family home. Offering three very well-proportioned bedrooms all with built in robes plus ensuite to the master bedroom with Walk in robe, a central bathroom, and accommodating laundry with external access.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and Evaporative cooling, split-system, Study/Sun room, large undercover entertaining area, wonderfully wide backyard and internal access to garage converted into second living area.
Close proximity to all the facilities Craigieburn has to offer including childcare, kinder, Hyde Park, Craigieburn Primary School, Mount Ridley P-12 College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School, Willmott Park Primary School, Hume Anglican Grammar as well as easy access to Hume Freeway.
This is an amazing opportunity to secure.

Description:
Ideal for your Family, Lifestyle and Budget.
An exciting opportunity to buy this 400m2 (approx.) allotment, titled and ready to build in the heart of the Botanical' estate in Mickleham. This is a unique buying opportunity for those who demand the best in the heart of Melbourne's north.
Within Botanical estate, your family will have plenty of room to play, relax and grow with over 30 hectares of planned open space. There's a planned 22-hectare botanical park featuring wetlands, a playground and breathtaking botanical-themed gardens, all just waiting to be explored.
Throughout Botanical there will be hectares of lush greenery, pocket parks lined with towering river red gums, plus a planned sporting oval and a vast network of walking and cycling trails that connect the whole neighbourhood.
A proposed primary school, local shopping village and convenience store are also planned for the residential community.
It doesn't get better than this, so don't delay, enquire today.
Contact Sharad Kapoor at 0416404595

Description:
Brand Spanking New!!!
If you are looking for a modern and contemporary family home located in the ever popular Merrifield Estate of Mickleham, you need to look no further! This picture perfect property ticks all the right boxes and should be on top of the "To be Inspected" list of all home hunters.
This magnificent brand new beauty showcases superior design, remarkable quality throughout and a versatile floorplan, offering the ultimate in family living and entertaining. Impeccably presented and styled to perfection, the sought-after multi-zone layout accommodates sun-drenched indoor and outdoor entertaining areas and a sleek sophisticated finish.
Offering an impressive open plan design, inclusive of a quality built kitchen with ample bench space, dishwasher, stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and a pantry. Flowing to the spacious meals and family area, additionally featuring a separate rumpus room, overlooking the outdoor undercover alfresco entertaining area, perfect for family gatherings all year round! 4 generous bedrooms including the luxury master suite with walk in robe and full ensuite with his/hers double basin, followed by an additional 3 bedrooms with BIR's and serviced by the well equipped central bathroom and separate WC.
Additional features include, polished timber flooring, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, double car remote garage with internal and external access, laundry with an abundance of storage space, seperate powder room, tiles to ceilings, downlights throughout and much more.
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
A place to grow.
This spacious and contemporary home offers room for the whole family both inside and out. The home includes four large bedrooms, two bathrooms, formal lounge as well as large open plan living/dining area and 2.5 car lock up garage with rear roller door access. Upgrades for this property include stone benchtops, a great sized pantry, 900ml stainless cooker, dishwasher and range hood, feature doors, gas ducted heating and much, much more.
Outside you will be pleased with a great alfresco area overlooking beautiful golf course reserve, the perfect backdrop with privacy. The yard is big enough for the kids to play or help in the established veggie garden. If location is what you're looking for, this property is perfectly positioned within the prestigious Mandalay Estate.
Internal area
235m²

Description:
CALLING ALL STARTERS AND INVESTORS
This single level Craigieburn unit is light and inviting, offering the easiest low maintenance opportunity you'll find. With natural light throughout and an unbeatable convenient location, the floor plan begin with a generous size family living, kitchen/dining area. There are also 2 great size bedroom plus study or 3rd bedroom with built in robes and a bright central bathroom with bath tube Additional features include Heating/Cooling, single garage with external access and walking distance to Craigieburn Train Station, Shops, Schools and much much more....
Call your Agent for Private Inspections

Description:
Opposite Craigieburn Central!
If you're looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go!
Situated in a quiet location opposite Craigieburn Central Shopping centre, public transport, local schools and shops, medical centre, child care facilities and the Craigieburn golf club, you really do have everything at your fingertips.
Featuring a great floor plan and many extras included heating & cooling, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, study and much more.
Don't let this opportunity pass you by, THIS ONE WON'T HANG AROUND FOR LONG!!!
